scripts.stage-start: export REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=false || set "REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=false" && npm run start
scripts.prod-start: export REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=true || set "REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=true" && npm run start
scripts.stage-build: export REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=false || set "REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=false" && npm run build --prod
scripts.prod-build: export REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=true || set "REACT_APP_CUSTOM_PROD=true" && npm run build --prod
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
